name: @solace-labs/ep-apim-openapi-node
description: Solace Event Portal APIM OpenAPI Client for NodeJS (Typescript), v2.0.0-ea.19
author: Solace Corporation

scripts.clean: rm -rf generated-src && rm -rf dist && rm -rf test/logs && rm -rf .turbo
scripts.test: yarn build:test && . ./test/source.env.sh && nyc mocha --config test/.mocharc.yml test/**/**.spec.ts && unset_source_env
scripts.test:x: yarn build:test && . ./test/source.env.sh && nyc mocha --config test/.mocharc.yml test/**/**.x-spec.ts && unset_source_env
scripts.test:x-manual: yarn build:test && . ./test/source.env.sh && nyc mocha --config test/.mocharc.yml test/**/**.x-manual-spec.ts && unset_source_env
